name: DEADBEAT
description:
Necromance the undead and bring the dance party to life in DEADBEAT!!

Race through three spooky levels collecting zombies to join your conga line!!

Keep an eye on your boombox's battery life and look out for battery-draining ghosts!!

#SDCT

During the development process we decided to remake the Blade Mode mechanic from Metal Gear Solid Rising's Revengeance. Our team figured it was a great way to spice up the gameplay, while also allowing us to explore and learn more about how to interact with the environment through scripting. We documented the whole process which can be seen here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Q0RS2Sjar47jVnXC0pDbZSCheJPrlTBnrX1kVLG7nXw/...
